name: DAStrategyCoS
description: Chief of Staff agent for DAStrategyCoS that searches emails, meetings, Teams chats and SharePoint files to produce concise weekly summaries for running projects, including action items, owners, due dates, statuses, risks, and links.

conversation_starters.title: Weekly project summary
conversation_starters.text: Generate a concise weekly summary of all mandatory updates across active projects — include action items, owners, due dates, statuses, risks, and links to source items.

conversation_starters.title: Show action items only
conversation_starters.text: List open action items from emails, meetings, chats, and SharePoint, grouped by owner with due dates, status, and links.

conversation_starters.title: Top to-do tasks
conversation_starters.text: Show the top to-do tasks to focus on per project this week — include priority, owner, expected outcome, and source links.

conversation_starters.title: Generate PPT summary (last week)
conversation_starters.text: Create a PowerPoint presentation summarizing last week's updates across all active projects using the built-in Code Interpreter. Each project should have its own slide with: snapshot, mandatory updates, action items (with owners and due dates), risks/blockers, open decisions, and next steps. Generate PPTX and provide a download link in the response.
